text: And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] called [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] unto Moses [strongs id="h4872" /], and spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8762" /] unto him out of the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],

Speak [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8761" /] unto the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], and say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] unto them, If any man [strongs id="h0120" /] of you bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] an offering [strongs id="h7133" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], ye shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] your offering [strongs id="h7133" /] of the cattle [strongs id="h0929" /], [even] of the herd [strongs id="h1241" /], and of the flock [strongs id="h6629" /].

If his offering [strongs id="h7133" /] [be] a burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /] of the herd [strongs id="h1241" /], let him offer [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] a male [strongs id="h2145" /] without blemish [strongs id="h8549" /]: he shall offer [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] it of his own voluntary will [strongs id="h7522" /] at the door [strongs id="h6607" /] of the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

And he shall put [strongs id="h5564" tvm="8804" /] his hand [strongs id="h3027" /] upon the head [strongs id="h7218" /] of the burnt offering [strongs id="h5930" /]; and it shall be accepted [strongs id="h7521" tvm="8738" /] for him to make atonement [strongs id="h3722" tvm="8763" /] for him.

And he shall kill [strongs id="h7819" tvm="8804" /] the bullock [strongs id="h1121" /] [strongs id="h1241" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: and the priests [strongs id="h3548" /], Aaron’s [strongs id="h0175" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /], shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8689" /] the blood [strongs id="h1818" /], and sprinkle [strongs id="h2236" tvm="8804" /] the blood [strongs id="h1818" /] round about [strongs id="h5439" /] upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /] that [is by] the door [strongs id="h6607" /] of the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /].
And he shall flay [strongs id="h6584" tvm="8689" /] the burnt offering [strongs id="h5930" /], and cut [strongs id="h5408" tvm="8765" /] it into his pieces [strongs id="h5409" /].

And the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of Aaron [strongs id="h0175" /] the priest [strongs id="h3548" /] shall put [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] fire [strongs id="h0784" /] upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /], and lay the wood [strongs id="h6086" /] in order [strongs id="h6186" tvm="8804" /] upon the fire [strongs id="h0784" /]:

And the priests [strongs id="h3548" /], Aaron’s [strongs id="h0175" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /], shall lay [strongs id="h6186" /] the parts [strongs id="h5409" /], the head [strongs id="h7218" /], and the fat [strongs id="h6309" /], in order [strongs id="h6186" tvm="8804" /] upon the wood [strongs id="h6086" /] that [is] on the fire [strongs id="h0784" /] which [is] upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /]:

But his inwards [strongs id="h7130" /] and his legs [strongs id="h3767" /] shall he wash [strongs id="h7364" tvm="8799" /] in water [strongs id="h4325" /]: and the priest [strongs id="h3548" /] shall burn [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8689" /] all on the altar [strongs id="h4196" /], [to be] a burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /], an offering made by fire [strongs id="h0801" /], of a sweet [strongs id="h5207" /] savour [strongs id="h7381" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

And if his offering [strongs id="h7133" /] [be] of the flocks [strongs id="h6629" /], [namely], of the sheep [strongs id="h3775" /], or of the goats [strongs id="h5795" /], for a burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /]; he shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] it a male [strongs id="h2145" /] without blemish [strongs id="h8549" /].

And he shall kill [strongs id="h7819" tvm="8804" /] it on the side [strongs id="h3409" /] of the altar [strongs id="h4196" /] northward [strongs id="h6828" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: and the priests [strongs id="h3548" /], Aaron’s [strongs id="h0175" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /], shall sprinkle [strongs id="h2236" tvm="8804" /] his blood [strongs id="h1818" /] round about [strongs id="h5439" /] upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /].

But he shall wash [strongs id="h7364" tvm="8799" /] the inwards [strongs id="h7130" /] and the legs [strongs id="h3767" /] with water [strongs id="h4325" /]: and the priest [strongs id="h3548" /] shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8689" /] [it] all, and burn [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8689" /] [it] upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /]: it [is] a burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /], an offering made by fire [strongs id="h0801" /], of a sweet [strongs id="h5207" /] savour [strongs id="h7381" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

And if the burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /] for his offering [strongs id="h7133" /] to the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [be] of fowls [strongs id="h5775" /], then he shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8689" /] his offering [strongs id="h7133" /] of turtledoves [strongs id="h8449" /], or of young [strongs id="h1121" /] pigeons [strongs id="h3123" /].

And the priest [strongs id="h3548" /] shall bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8689" /] it unto the altar [strongs id="h4196" /], and wring off [strongs id="h4454" tvm="8804" /] his head [strongs id="h7218" /], and burn [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8689" /] [it] on the altar [strongs id="h4196" /]; and the blood [strongs id="h1818" /] thereof shall be wrung out [strongs id="h4680" tvm="8738" /] at the side [strongs id="h7023" /] of the altar [strongs id="h4196" /]:

And he shall pluck away [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8689" /] his crop [strongs id="h4760" /] with his feathers [strongs id="h5133" /], and cast [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8689" /] it beside [strongs id="h0681" /] the altar [strongs id="h4196" /] on the east part [strongs id="h6924" /], by the place [strongs id="h4725" /] of the ashes [strongs id="h1880" /]:

And he shall cleave [strongs id="h8156" tvm="8765" /] it with the wings [strongs id="h3671" /] thereof, [but] shall not divide [it] asunder [strongs id="h0914" tvm="8686" /]: and the priest [strongs id="h3548" /] shall burn [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8689" /] it upon the altar [strongs id="h4196" /], upon the wood [strongs id="h6086" /] that [is] upon the fire [strongs id="h0784" /]: it [is] a burnt sacrifice [strongs id="h5930" /], an offering made by fire [strongs id="h0801" /], of a sweet [strongs id="h5207" /] savour [strongs id="h7381" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

And when any [strongs id="h5315" /] will offer [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] a meat [strongs id="h4503" /] offering [strongs id="h7133" /] unto the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], his offering [strongs id="h7133" /] shall be [of] fine flour [strongs id="h5560" /]; and he shall pour [strongs id="h3332" tvm="8804" /] oil [strongs id="h8081" /] upon it, and put [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] frankincense [strongs id="h3828" /] thereon:
